This BM is part of a network of benchmarks established and probably maintained by the French SHOM (Society Hydrographic Oceanographic Marine). NT 3-2019 update: No longer harbor masters office, now just a community shelter area with benchs. In 2016 Jason found this mark obstructed by a wooden bench slat. I trimmed abut 1cm off the slat and now it is no longer obstructed.
